1: Moses had the first tablet that could connect to the cloud.

2: The first computer dates back to Adam and Eve. It was an Apple with limited memory, just one byte. And then everything crashed.

3: I changed my password to "incorrect". So whenever I forget what it is the computer will say "Your password is incorrect".

4: Maybe if we start telling people the brain is an app they will start using it.

5: Q: What do you call the security outside of a Samsung Store? A: Guardians of the Galaxy.

6: I think my neighbor is stalking me as she's been googling my name on her computer. I saw it through my telescope last night.

7: A clean house is the sign of a broken computer.

8: A computer once beat me at chess, but it was no match for me at kick boxing.

9: Entered what I ate today into my new fitness app and it just sent an ambulance to my house.

10: Talking to a liberal is like trying to explain social media to a 70 years old.
